variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a missense mutation resulting in the substitution of glutamine with a stop codon.
This variant results in a substitution of arginine with tryptophan at position 113.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293-A5 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was absent for the variant NM_014794.5:c.63C>T, indicating a frameshift and premature termination.
Protein expression was decreased by 30% for the variant NM_004352.6:c.337C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 70% on day 5.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 30% on day 5.
